## Footprint interface

Describes how much space something takes up on the table, represented as a 2D box with a width and height.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Footprint 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./bge-core.footprint.height.md) |  | number | Size along the Z-axis. |
|  [width](./bge-core.footprint.width.md) |  | number | Size along the X-axis. |
